name: GreenThumb
0:
”Alexa, tell Green Thumb that I watered”
”Alexa, ask Green Thumb When did I water”
”Alexa, tell Green Thumb that I watered my plants”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: green thumb
des: Green Thumb records when you watered your plants or lawn, and tells you when was the last time that you watered. Each time you water, just say "Alexa, tell Green Thumb that I watered". To find out when was the last time that you watered, just say "Alexa, ask Green Thumb when I watered"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
